comment.p: Emulates Sega System 32 and Model 1 based games

revision.comment: Changed Outrunners ROMs for Modeler v0.9.3a (CMPro can shorten the old ROMs automatically).
Added Virtua Fighter sound ROMs for Modeler v0.9.3.
Added Title Fight for Modeler v0.9.2.
Updated dats (corrected a couple of CRCs in Rad Rally, get the ROMs from Rad Mobile).
Uploaded dats for v0.9.0 of Modeler (12 games added).
Uploaded dats for v0.1.1 of Modeler (Arabian Fight, Virtua Racing and Virtua Fighter added).
Uploaded dats for v0.1.0 of Modeler.
